title: Jungle meta ( return of the mummy??)
body:
So like most people I watch a few YouTubers and a stream here or there, and there all saying tank jungle is the current meta. 
So is amumu in or out this meta or what about sion

replies.body:
Ammumu is especially powerful at low elo, Sejuani, Zac, Volibear, Skarner, Moakai and Cho'gath are also pretty strong. The issue is the Jungle Tanks have to be good at ganking and clearing fast and moving around the map, and need to be gold efficient early on.

Unless you can wall drift like a god (takes a bit of practice but not too bad once you get the hang of it), then Sion is bad at ganking and he's got a slow clear speed. Nautilus is also bad at ganking, has a slow clear and takes too long to get around the map. 

Earlygame is very important in the meta right now and surprisingly alot of tank junglers are exceptional early duelists, and I think it'd be more accurate to say we're in an early-midgame tank meta. 

Tanks that take too long to scale just don't have the same impact, hence why Malphite, Naut, Sion and Shen don't fare too well on average.

So yeah some jungle tanks are meta, but don't just assume that every tank is a good jungler.
